text: Hagi pristi eri'zama e'neriza nagapintima Jerusalemima age'zama refako hu'za zamage'nazana Habaiama, Hakozima, Barzilai nagaki'za zamagia omnenege'za, pristi vahera fore hugara osu'naze. Hagi Barzilai naga nofi'mokizmi nezamageho'a, Gileadi ran kumateti Barzilai mofa ara eri'neanki'za, e'inahu hu'za naga nofi'zamimofo zamagia nehaze.
